note:
Australian born, living in Montreal, Canada. Work largely with words -- print, film, TV -- and value them highly. Preoccupied in recent years with the raising of endlessly amusing children.

Life upended by this never-ending pandemic. Currently homeschooling my youngest due to unmanageable school environment.

Enthusiasms: excellent TV (The Leftovers; Boardwalk Empire; Deadwood; almost anything British). Music, all kinds. Occasional (but zesty!) knitter. Nature.

Less Covid, please.
